title: A Day in the Life of Architect David Rockwell
text:
Over the past three and a half decades, David Rockwell and his architecture and design firm, Rockwell Group, have built a reputation for their versatility and prolific output. From vibey hotels to Broadway sets, solemn memorials to grand restaurants, each case is an opportunity to expand their repertoire. “We are obsessively not interested in repeating ourselves,” the New York–based architect says. “There’s still a sense that every detail matters, even after all these years.”

Sixty-four Rockwell Group projects have debuted...
description: From designing Nobu Downtown to creating Broadway sets, the architect’s wide-ranging practice involves seeking out each project’s narrative thread.
